questions: What event should be used when a customer views a promotion banner or text?
What is an example of when this event should be used?
What happens when a customer views a promotion banner or text?
answer:
# Event: Promotion Viewed
This event should be used when a customer viewed a promotion banner or text.

Example Usage

* A customer visits a website and sees a promotion banner on the homepage. They don't click on it but continue browsing
  the site.
